Classes in org.javact.lang used by org.javact.lang
Actor
          Marking (empty) interface.
Agent
           
BecomeCtI
          *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a Become component.
Controler
          The controler of an actor.
CreateCtI
          *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a Create component.
Future
          Defines partially a Future object, for client-server-like interaction.
GoException
          A GoException is thrown when a RuntimeException occurs when an actor moves.
HookInterface
          Specification of objects used for actor's behavior resuming when mobility fails.
JavActComponent
          JavActComponent contains the code needed to access to the controler from within each component, and offers a default method to terminate itself.
JavActComponentInt
          Specification of the common features of actors' components.
JavActException
          JavAct run-time exception, superclass for all library-level exceptions which can be thrown to the application level
LifeCycleCtI
          *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a LifeCycle component.
MailBoxCtI
          *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a MailBox component.
Message
          Marking interface for messages (empty).
MessageHandleException
          Exception in the message handling step.
MessageWithReply
          Message for client-server-like interaction.
MoveCtI
          *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a Move component.
QuasiBehavior
          Actors' primary behavior, with the standard available methods.
SendCtI
          *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a Send component.
SendException
          A SendException is thrown when a RuntimeException occurs when a send fails.
ServerSideAnswerBack
          Specification of server-side objects in charge of returning a result to a client, in case of client-server-like interaction (MessageWithReply).
